entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this morning. Fog patches dissipating early this morning. Wind becoming west 20 km/h this afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few flurries. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near midnight then clearing. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 05 March 2023
